data.actual_result: The user still has the color of the lower role.
data.expected_result: The user's name color should change to the color of the higher role.
data.short_description: On Android, name color of user doesn't change after editing role colors (Edit: Does fix eventually, just not right away).
data.steps_to_repro: - (Might not work for invisible users) Give an offline user two roles, one without color and one with color.  Assign the one without color higher. - While the user is still offline, change the color of the higher one.
